In this epsiode, we look at the first human trials of a vaccine, how Japan is faring in its battle against COVID-19, and our panel answers your … [+476 chars]

articles.author: Lara Pearce
articles.title: Ten hospital staff isolated after Sydney doctor tests positive - 9News
articles.description: Ten staff across two western Sydney hospitals are in isolation today after a doctor was diagnosed with COVID-19.
